claim: The Contender stars Gary Oldman as James Bond.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Identified in the late 1980s with the `` Brit Pack '' , he was described by critic Roger Ebert as `` the best young British actor around '' .

premise_source_doc_sentence: The James Bond series focuses on a fictional British Secret Service agent created in 1953 by writer Ian Fleming , who featured him in twelve novels and two short-story collections .
